name: Was England will! LCCN2004666106 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Was England will! Abstract: Poster shows swarms of British planes bombing a factory. Text: What England wants! Additional text is a quote from British Labour party leader Johnson-Hicks which appeared in the Daily Telegraph, Jan. 3, 1918: "One must bomb the Rhine industrial area day by day with hundreds of airplanes, until the cure [destruction of German industrial production] has occurred." Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 98 x 67 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Egon Tschirch 1918.; Title from item.
